Name: Arkasha
About the game: Arkanoid who has a name. ARKASHA will return with low price and good optimization. Arkasha - arkanoid from 90's. In this game you destroy the bricks and after that you going to next level Features: - Gamepad support - 20 levels - Easter eggs - One life, one try
